short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get real-time, organized R&D and market insights for any word(s) you see in a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can select any word(s) in a webpage, and search Mergeflow for it. Mergeflow will then give you real-time and organized insights into venture fundings, market analyses, R&D publications, patents, news, blogs, and other science and technology contents. These contents are from massive, curated, and analyzed R&D datasets.

So that you can use this extension, you need a Mergeflow account. If you don't already have one, you can sign up for a free trial at https://mergeflow.net/signup.

Information about the datasets available in Mergeflow:
https://faq.mergeflow.com/data-sets

How to use the extension:

1. Mark a word or (small) group of words
2. Right-click
3. Select "Search Mergeflow for..."
